    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_2374f4cc69ee91e7f8e6a00b9a245f58bd4da26c</entry>
          </identifier>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_2374f4cc69ee91e7f8e6a00b9a245f58bd4da26c</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Decomposition experiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufspaltungexperiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience de décomposition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência do decomposition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento di decomposizione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα αποσύνθεσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimento de la descomposición</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows one experiment (left side of the picture) which demonstrates a physical change and another (on the right) showing a decomposition reaction which is considered as a chemical change.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sulphur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper carbonate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physical change</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Experiment (linke Seite 
der Abbildung) welches eine körperliche Änderung zeigt und andere 
(auf dem Recht) einer Aufspaltungreaktion zeigend, welches als 
chemische Umwandlung betrachtet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une expérience (côté 
gauche de l'image) ce qui démontre un changement physique et des 
autres (du côté droit) montrant à une réaction de décomposition 
ce qu'est considéré comme changement chimique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma experiência (lado 
esquerdo do retrato) qual demonstra uma mudança física e outra (na 
direita) que mostra a uma reação do decomposition qual é 
considerado como uma mudança química.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un esperimento (parte 
di sinistra dell'immagine) quale dimostra un cambiamento fisico ed un 
altro (a destra) che mostrano ad una reazione di decomposizione quale 
è considerato come cambiamento chimico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα πείραμα (αριστερή 
πλευρά της εικόνας) που καταδεικνύει μια φυσική αλλαγή και άλλο 
(στο δικαίωμα) που εμφανίζει αντίδραση αποσύνθεσης που θεωρείται 
ως χημική αλλαγή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un experimento (lado 
izquierdo del cuadro) cuál demuestra un cambio físico y otro (a la 
derecha) que muestra a una reacción de la descomposición cuál se 
considera como cambio químico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwefel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kupfernes Karbonat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">körperliche Änderung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">soufre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carbonate de cuivre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la chaleur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">changement physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">enxôfre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carbonato de cobre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">calor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mudança física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">zolfo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">carbonato di rame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamento fisico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανθρακικό άλας χαλκού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμότητα</string>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
